entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Rom√©o LeBlanc Int'l Airport 10:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: ESE 56 km/h gust 82 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then partly cloudy. Rain mixed with freezing rain early this evening. Risk of a thundershower late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then clearing. Risk of snow squalls. Amount 10 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
